AT.name: Ninja Usagimaru - The Gem of Blessings -
AT.description: You control Usagimaru, and sets off on a journey to rescue captivated villagers from the evil grasps of the Mononoke. Your mission is to bring the villagers to the safety of the Usagi Statue. In each stage there will be a captured villager, and the path to rescue them is filled with various traps and Mononoke. Use the various tools you have at possession, and utilise the terrain and even the Mononoke themselves in order to rescue the villagers, and finally bring them to safety!

BG.name: Ninja Usagimaru - The Gem of Blessings -
BG.description: You control Usagimaru, and sets off on a journey to rescue captivated villagers from the evil grasps of the Mononoke. Your mission is to bring the villagers to the safety of the Usagi Statue. In each stage there will be a captured villager, and the path to rescue them is filled with various traps and Mononoke. Use the various tools you have at possession, and utilise the terrain and even the Mononoke themselves in order to rescue the villagers, and finally bring them to safety!

BE.name: Ninja Usagimaru - The Gem of Blessings -
BE.description: Dans « Ninja Usagimaru - The Gem of Blessings - », le joueur commande Usagimaru et part à l'aventure pour secourir les villageoises sous l'emprise maléfique des mononokes. Il devra pour ce faire utiliser divers outils et obstacles à son avantage afin de ramener les villageoises en lieu sûr, ce dernier étant représenté par une statue Usagi. Il y a une villageoise capturée dans chaque niveau et le chemin pour les secourir est parsemé de nombreux pièges et de mononokes. Utilisez les divers outils en votre possession et servez-vous du terrain ainsi que des mononokes afin de secourir les villageoises et les emmener en lieu sûr ! Secourez toutes les villageoises et ramenez la paix dans le village !

ES.name: Ninja Usagimaru - The Gem of Blessings -
ES.description: En "Ninja Usagimaru: La gema de las bendiciones", el jugador controla a Usagimaru y se embarca en una aventura para rescatar a los aldeanos prisioneros de las garras de los malvados Mononoke, con varios obstáculos y herramientas a su favor, hasta llevarlos a la estatua Usagi para su seguridad. En cada etapa hay un aldeano prisionero, y el camino para rescatarlo está repleto de trampas y Mononoke. ¡Usa las distintas herramientas a tu disposición e incluso a los Mononoke para rescatar a los aldeanos y llevarlos a casa a salvo!

PT.name: Ninja Usagimaru - The Gem of Blessings -
PT.description: Em "Ninja Usagimaru - A jóia das nossas orações -", o jogador controla Usagimaru e inicia um jornada para resgatar os aldeões aprisionados das garras diabólicas dos espíritos Mononoke e levá-los em segurança até a Estátua do Coelho, utilizando para isso diversas ferramentas e tirando proveito dos obstáculos do cenário. Em cada fase haverá um aldeão capturado e o caminho para o seu resgate está cheio de armadilhas e espíritos Mononoke. Você deverá usar as ferramentas que possui, aproveitar o terreno e até mesmo os Mononoke para salvar os aldeões, conduzindo-os em segurança! Salve os aldeões e traga a paz para a aldeia novamente!
